DOC.brief_summary: An observational , non-interventional , multi-centre study provide information ratio LDL-C HDL-C improvement statin treatment Korean patient group .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Into RAtio LDL-CHolestEroL HDL-Cholesterol Improvement After Statin Treatment Korean Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects take lipidlowering medication diagnose dyslipidaemia Subjects least make 1 visit outpatient clinic within previous 6 month Subjects record LDLC HDLC & statin treatment ( least four week statin take ) Subjects unwilling unable provide examination lab result medical chart .
DOC.keyword: Ratio Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol High Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Improvement
